mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_CODE "boardCode", BOARD_NAME "boardName" FROM "BOARD_TYPE" ORDER BY BOARD_CODE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD" WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NAME, BOARD_WRITE_DATE, READ_COUNT, LIKE_COUNT, BOARD_CODE FROM "BOARD" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NAME, BOARD_WRITE_DATE, READ_COUNT, LIKE_COUNT, BOARD_CODE FROM "BOARD" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT LEVEL, C.* FROM (SELECT COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(COMMENT_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') COMMENT_WRITE_DATE, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, PARENT_COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_DEL_FL FROM "COMMENT" JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}) C WHERE COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' OR 0 != (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" SUB WHERE SUB.PARENT_COMMENT_NO = C.COMMENT_NO AND COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N') START WITH PARENT_COMMENT_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR COMMENT_NO = PARENT_COMMENT_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY COMMENT_NO
SELECT BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOARD_WRITE_DATE, BOARD_CODE, BOARD_NO FROM "BOARD" WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY BOARD_WRITE_DATE DESC
